short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark youtube videos (with timestamp) and watch them later

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yookmark helps you bookmark YouTube videos. This extension will bookmark the YouTube video along with the timestamp so that you can resume the video from where you left off. To bookmark a video:
1. Open the Yookmark extension
2. Click on Bookmark button
3. Your bookmark will be saved, click on the "Open in New Tab" icon to open the video or click on the "Delete" icon to delete the bookmark.
